Xutil.

Imports

xlib

Types

Region = ptr object
Region data type. 
SizeHintsAspect = object
  x*: cint                   ## Numerator.
  y*: cint                   ## Denominator.
  
SizeHintsFlags = distinct clong
WMHintsFlags = distinct clong
XClassHint {.final, pure.} = object
  res_name*: cstring
  res_class*: cstring

XComposeStatus {.final, pure.} = object
  compose_ptr*: pointer      ## State table pointer.
  chars_matched*: cint       ## Match state.
Compose sequence status structure, used in calling XLookupString. 
XContext = distinct cint
XICCEncodingStyle = enum
  XStringStyle,             ## `STRING`.
  XCompoundTextStyle,       ## `COMPOUND_TEXT`.
  XTextStyle,               ## Text in owner's encoding (current locale).
  XStdICCTextStyle,         ## `STRING` or `COMPOUND_TEXT`.
  XUTF8StringStyle           ## `UTF8_STRING` (XFree86e extension, Nov 2000).
XIconSize {.final, pure.} = object
  min_width*, min_height*: cint
  max_width*, max_height*: cint
  width_inc*, height_inc*: cint

XSizeHints {.final, pure.} = object
  flags*: clong              ## Bit mask of fields defined below.
  x*, y*: cint               ## Required for old WMs.
  width*, height*: cint      ## Required for old WMs.
  min_width*, min_height*: cint
  max_width*, max_height*: cint
  width_inc*, height_inc*: cint
  min_aspect*, max_aspect*: SizeHintsAspect
  base_width*, base_height*: cint ## Added by ICCCM version 1.
  win_gravity*: cint         ## Added by ICCCM version 1.
  
XStandardColormap {.final, pure.} = object
  colormap*: Colormap
  red_max*: culong
  red_mult*: culong
  green_max*: culong
  green_mult*: culong
  blue_max*: culong
  blue_mult*: culong
  base_pixel*: culong
  visualid*: VisualID        ## Added by ICCCM version 1.
  killid*: XID               ## Added by ICCCM version 1.
Window manager property to share standard RGB_COLOR_MAP color maps. 
XTextProperty {.final, pure.} = object
  value*: ptr byte           ## same as Property routines.
  encoding*: Atom            ## prop type.
  format*: cint              ## prop data format: 8, 16, or 32.
  nitems*: culong            ## number of data items in value.
Text manipulating properties WM_NAME, WM_ICON_NAME, WM_CLIENT_MACHINE, WM_COMMAND. 
XVisualInfo {.final, pure.} = object
  visual*: ptr Visual
  visualid*: VisualID
  screen*: cint
  depth*: cint
  class*: cint
  red_mask*: culong
  green_mask*: culong
  blue_mask*: culong
  colormap_size*: cint
  bits_per_rgb*: cint
Visual info. 
XWMHints {.final, incompletestruct, pure.} = object
  flags*: clong              ## Bit mask of fields defined below.
  input*: Bool               ## Does app rely on the WM to get keyboard input?
  initial_state*: cint       ## Initial state.
  icon_pixmap*: Pixmap       ## Icon pixmap.
  icon_window*: Window       ## Icon window.
  icon_x*, icon_y*: cint     ## Icon initial position.
  icon_mask*: Pixmap         ## Icon mask bitmap.
  window_group*: XID         ## Related window group ID.
Window manager hints. May be extended in the future.
